title: OXO Large Silicone Drying Mat
description: Efficiently dry large and delicate items with the OXO Good Grips Large Silicone Drying Mat. The Drying Mat's unique ribbed design maximizes aeration and elevates items, keeping them clean and sanitary. The large rectangular shape can accommodate a variety of dishes and cookware. Once items are dry, the easy-to-clean Mat can be rolled up or hung for storage.  The heat resistant silicone material allows the Mat to double as a trivet.

Efficiently dry large and delicate items with the OXO Good Grips Large Silicone Drying Mat. The Drying Mat's unique ribbed design maximizes aeration and elevates items, keeping them clean and sanitary. The large rectangular shape can accommodate a variety of dishes and cookware. Once items are dry, the easy-to-clean Mat can be rolled up or hung for storage.  The heat resistant silicone material allows the Mat to double as a trivet.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: Sometimes you don't want a large dish rack to clutter your counter top or simply don't have the room, but there are several items we  like to hand wash in the kitchen including our favorite knives, cookware, and glassware. The OXO silicone drying mats provide a nonslip surface to provide delicate items as they dry. The unique rib design helps to maximize drainage and aeration and a heat resistant surface is safe up to 425 degrees-- making them great to use as trivets. To wash, just throw these silicone drying mats in the dishwasher where you can roll them up for compact storage. They come in a variety of sizes to fit your kitchen's needs. The large silicone drying mat is perfect for drying large items such as 12 inch frying pans, platters, salad bowls, and more. Here's a good tip. One OXO fan uses this mat at the front door to put his snowy boots on when he comes in from walking his dog.
